Hi, I am Akshit!

अक्षित अरोड़ा
Akshit Arora
ਅਕ੍ਸ਼ਿਤ ਅਰੋੜਾ
("AHK-shiht Ah-RO-duh")

Currently, I am a graduate student at University of Colorado, Boulder. My main research interests are Deep Learning, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing. I did my bachelors from Thapar University, Patiala, India.
During my undergraduate degree, I have worked in the area of Cognitive Science and Augmented Reality under the supervision of Dr. Varun Dutt at Applied Cognitive Science Laboratory (ACS Lab), Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Mandi. As a result of my internship at ACS Lab I got the opportunity to give oral presentations of 3 research papers at 7th International Conference on Applied Human Factors and Ergonomics Conference (AHFE) 2016, write one book chapter (published in Springer) and a journal paper (published in Natural Hazards Earth System Sciences).
Research apart, I love photography, hiking and listening to music. And I am always looking out for opportunities to travel. I regularly update my instagram (akshit1995) and 500px (akshitarora) profiles.
